snippet.title: Hela - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
From the creators of Unravel comes Hela, a new heart-warming open world game for PS5. 

Hela tells the enchanting story of a witch and her familiars—a gang of brave little mice. For ages, the kind witch has used her magic to aid the local folk, but now she has fallen ill and needs help herself. It’s up to the mice to find a cure and keep the “witch business” running in the meantime!

Features:

Be a Witch’s Familiar: Play as a brave and agile mouse with magical perks.
Engaging Gameplay: Mixes exploration, traversal, foraging, puzzles, action, and brewing.
Healing Experience: Set in the beautiful northern Scandinavian nature, offering a pleasant and soothing adventure.

Hela offers a delightful blend of adventure and cozy entertainment. Enjoy exploring vast, open spaces, engaging in light-hearted play, and experiencing the simple pleasure of being part of a caring community.

#ps5 #ps5games #hela
